author's_name_(_зохиогч): NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI MTSEO BDUN GYI LHA KHANG CHEN MO'I D'A BLA MA DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG GI RGYUN GYIS PHYUGS PA'I DKA' CHEN BKA' 'GYUR BA BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS, ,,RIG GNAS SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR NANG RIG PA DANG, GSO BA RIG PA LA RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I AER TE NI NO MIN HANG RAB BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN, ,T'A BLA MA DON GRUB RAB BRTAN SOGS DON GNYER CAN MANG POS BSKUL BA LTAR BAN RGAN SNYOMS LAS PA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN DPAL BZANG POS MTSO BDUN GYI LHA KHANG CHEN MOR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN NGAG DBANG PHUN TSOGS SO, ,DGE'O, ,)
